Contact.cont: Feel free to reach out to us anytime if you have any questions or need further information. We are here to assist you with anything you need.
Contact.name: Your name

GameHub.Expl: Explore our latest games! Click on any game below to start playing or discover upcoming releases. Stay tuned for more exciting adventures.
GameHub.DiveInto: We are excited to introduce our inaugural project, Kalakobana. This digital version of a classic Georgian trivia game invites players to think creatively as they name items based on a randomly chosen letter from the Georgian alphabet. From names and cities to plants and movies, each round promises creativity and fun!
GameHub.ComingSoon: Coming Soon... Stay tuned for the next exciting game release!

Hero.Buzzing: Wise Buzzer is an innovative startup dedicated to merging education with entertainment. Our mission is to transform the way people engage with knowledge through fun and interactive games. Inspired by the idea of spreading positivity and wisdom, we aim to deliver enriching experiences through our apps.

Pluses.UL: We Make Cool and Impressive Stuff
Pluses.OT: At Wise Buzzer, we offer something special for those who love games and learning. Hereâ€™s why you should pick us:
Pluses.FLT: Our trivia games are different and exciting. We create fresh challenges and interesting topics that make every game enjoyable
Pluses.FPT: We blend educational elements with entertaining gameplay, helping players expand their knowledge while having fun.
Pluses.FFT: All our games will be completely free to play, ensuring that everyone can join in on the fun.

AboutUs.HWS: What is the idea behind Wise Buzzer?
AboutUs.ShortText: Our vision is to turn learning into a fun experience for everyone. We aim to design games that help players discover new things while having a great time. We believe in creating a space where learning and fun go hand in hand. We aim to combine learning with enjoyment by developing games that engage players and stimulate their minds.
AboutUs.fullText: Our goal is to spread knowledge and positivity while making education fun for everyone. We aim to combine learning with enjoyment by developing games that engage players and stimulate their minds. Our goal is to spread knowledge and positivity while making education fun for everyone. Our mission is to enhance education through fun and interactive gaming experiences. We strive to foster a love for learning and create a supportive community where everyone can thrive.

Tech.TD: We build highly scalable games using cutting-edge technology stacks that are both powerful and reliable. They truly are the backbone of our success!
Tech.Angular: A powerhouse for building dynamic web apps.
Tech.Net: Our trusted tool for building strong back-end systems.
Tech.Flutter: Perfect for creating smooth cross-platform mobile apps.
Tech.DB: We utilize both relational and NoSQL databases.
Tech.SS: We uphold the latest security standards to keep everything safe.
Tech.Azure: Our choice for reliable hosting solutions.

Crew.OCT: The driving force behind our company and the foundation of our vision
Crew.GCT: Giorgi drives the technical strategy for the Wise Buzzer platform and manages the technology stack, focusing on innovation and excellence in software development.
Crew.LJT: As co-founder and CTO, Luka is the creative force behind the Wise Buzzer platform and brand. He drives the technical strategy and inspires the team with innovative ideas.
